info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 6 at 8:53AM CDT until June 11 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City KS
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Dodge City KS has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Kansas...
Crooked Creek Near Englewood affecting Meade County.
For the Crooked Creek...including Englewood...flooding is possible.
* WHAT...Flooding is possible.
* WHERE...Crooked Creek near Englewood.
* WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to Wednesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Prepare for minor inundations of one or more feet along the Crooked Creek in southern Meade County as floodwaters leave the main channel and moves out onto the floodplain.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 3.4 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 6.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding.
Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 500 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY MORNING
